customer_sentiment.description: The customer was attempting to make a payment but was unable to due to an issue with their credit card number, leading to frustration.

agent_performance: The agent was patient and apologetic, but the customer's issue could not be resolved due to a technical limitation with the payment system.

timestamped_events.description: The assistant introduced themselves and the purpose of the call.
The assistant disclosed the debt and the amount owed.
The customer attempted to make a payment but provided an invalid credit card number.
The customer expressed frustration with the situation and the inability to make a payment.
The agent offered alternative solutions, including contacting the bank to verify the card number.
The customer continued to express frustration and ended the call.
